name: Hugo Fixed
postCreateCommand: wget -q -O hugo.tar.gz https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases/download/v0.119.0/hugo_extended_0.119.0_linux-amd64.tar.gz && tar -zxvf hugo.tar.gz hugo && sudo mv hugo /usr/bin/hugo && sudo cp /usr/bin/hugo /usr/local/bin/hugo && rm hugo.tar.gz && echo 'Hugo Downgrade Complete'
